title: Virologists discover safer potential Zika vaccine

title_detail.value: Virologists discover safer potential Zika vaccine

summary: In mouse trials, a vaccine based on recombinant adenovirus protected against Zika without evidence of antibodies. Reports have shown Zika antibodies can worsen Dengue virus infection.

summary_detail.value: In mouse trials, a vaccine based on recombinant adenovirus protected against Zika without evidence of antibodies. Reports have shown Zika antibodies can worsen Dengue virus infection.
